name: Vengeance of Gurn
description:
Important:

This game was made for PC/Mac/Linux.

Since WebGL doesn't handle unity audio mixers very well, the playable browser version suffers from some audio control issues.

Download the game below for best quality! Since this is a prototype I decided to keep it online so that players can easily take a look. Credits:

Description:

Vengeance of Gurn is a small prototype of a on-rails-shooter type of game. This game was based on the project "Argon Assault" from gamedev.tv.

Fly as Gurn, a dragon betrayed by the Council of Dragons and defeat all enemies in order to escape the fire lands.

Features:

-Fly as Gurn and destroy enemies using his firebreath;

-Face a variety of enemies with different abilities;

-Defeat a final boss.

Controls:

-Movement - Direction Arrows/WASD;

-Firebreath - Spacebar/Left Mouse Button;

-Pause Game - Escape.
